author: Sonia Moghe and Amir Vera, CNN
title: Juror in Ghislaine Maxwell trial may have lied on jury questionnaire form
description: One of the seated jurors in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial may have lied on a jury questionnaire form, according to a newly unsealed copy of the form.
content:
(CNN)One of the seated jurors in Ghislaine Maxwell's sex trafficking trial may have lied on a jury questionnaire form, according to a newly unsealed copy of the form.
